Package Managers.UserManager

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
Managers.UserManager.UserManager
public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class: java.Managers.UserManager.UserManager

Manages the data of all the user objects, and stores all the users registered in the system.

In a nutshell, This class allows to modify, read and analyze the data of all the users in the system.

See Also:
User

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UserManager()
    constructs a user manager with one user, and all the attributes initialized

      public void createNewMyLocation​(Location location)
      adds a location that the currently-registered user has created to the user's locations list
      Parameters:
      location - the location created by the user that will be added

      route - that route planned by the user that will be added

      public void addFavLocation​(Location location, java.lang.String type)

      Parameters:
      location - the location of the favorite location to be added
      type - the type of the favorite location to be added

    • addFavStationsAndStops

      public boolean addFavStationsAndStops​(FavLocation location, java.util.ArrayList<Station> stations, java.util.ArrayList<Stop> stops)
      adds all the favorite stations and stops specified in the parameter that are close to the specified favorite location
      Parameters:
      location - the favorite location to be referenced in the search
      stations - an array of all stations around the referenced favorite location
      stops - an array of all the stops around the referenced favorite location
      Returns:
      true if the location has been added successfully, and false otherwise

    • getLocationHistory
